    public class NormalizedProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements QueryProcessor
    An implementation of QueryProcessor uses the dot product between vector to calculate th score for each document

    • Method Detail

      • processQueries

        public void processQueries(java.util.List<Query> queries,
                           InvertedIndex idx,
                           double threshold)
        Calculates the scores for each document using the dot product and the normalized scores of the document and query
        Specified by:
        processQueries in interface QueryProcessor
        Parameters:
        queries - A List of Query objects that contains the term of the query and where the results will be stored.
        idx - An InvertedIndex that contains the index terms of the corpus
        threshold - The minimum values of the result scores
